class.name: EditorVCSInterfaceGit
class.brief_description: A built-in version control plugin which provides [url=https://git-scm.com/]Git[/url] functionality.
class.description: This plugin provides basic [url=https://git-scm.com/]Git[/url] functionality from within the editor powered by [url=https://libgit2.org/]libgit2[/url] library. Note that pulling and pushing are not available in [EditorVCSInterface] as of Godot 3.x. Signed commits are not implemented yet.
